thread.title: BRIEF-Acasta Announces Court Hearing Date For Arrangement In Connection With Sale Of Stellwagen Business Unit

title: BRIEF-Acasta Announces Court Hearing Date For Arrangement In Connection With Sale Of Stellwagen Business Unit

organizations.name: sale of stellwagen business unit reuters staff

text: March 20, 2018 / 5:34 PM / Updated 14 minutes ago BRIEF-Acasta Announces Court Hearing Date For Arrangement In Connection With Sale Of Stellwagen Business Unit Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 20 (Reuters) - Acasta Enterprises Inc: * ACASTA ANNOUNCES COURT HEARING DATE FOR ARRANGEMENT IN CONNECTION WITH THE SALE OF STELLWAGEN BUSINESS UNIT * ACASTA ENTERPRISES - SUPERIOR COURT OF JUSTICE (ONTARIO) HEARING FOR ORDER APPROVING SALE OF UNIT TO BE HELD ON MARCH 23 * ACASTA ENTERPRISES- PURPOSE OF HEARING TO REDUCE COâ€™S CLASS B SHARE CAPITAL TO SATISFY OBCA REQUIREMENTS RELATED TO 26 MILLION CLASS B SHARE REPURCHASE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
